name: House of glass (Stopa, Rozari)
description:
House of Glass lets you take care of your own glasshouse. You can buy small plants and if you take care of them, water them regularly and make sure they have the right temperature, they will flourish and then you can sell them for profit or keep them and enjoy their beauty.

Controls: Mouse is enough, but you can switch between rooms with arrows, pause the game with P and go to the menu with Escape.

What to click: There are three spots in each room. Click them to reveal available actions. Click (and hold) on the water droplet to water the pot.

Music: Midnight Tale, Somewhere Sunny and Windswept by Kevin MacLeod
